Package com.github.oeuvres.alix.lucene.search

Class Doc

java.lang.Object
com.github.oeuvres.alix.lucene.search.Doc
public class Doc extends Object
Tools to display a document

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Doc(Alix alix, int docId)
    Get a document by lucene docId (persists as long as the Lucene index is not modified) with all fields loaded (even the big ones).
    Doc(Alix alix, int docId, HashSet<String> fieldsToLoad)
    Get a document by lucene docId (persists as long as the Lucene index is not modified) with the set of fields provided (or all fields fieldsToLoad is null).
    Doc(Alix alix, String id)
    Get a document by String id (persists as long as the source XML doc is not modified) with all fields loaded (even the big ones).
    Doc(Alix alix, String id, HashSet<String> fieldsToLoad)
    Get a document by String id (persists as long as the source XML doc is not modified), with the set of fields provided (or all fields if fieldsToLoad is null).

  • Constructor Details

    • Doc

      public Doc(Alix alix, String id) throws IOException
      Get a document by String id (persists as long as the source XML doc is not modified) with all fields loaded (even the big ones).
      Parameters:
      alix - wrapper on a lucene index.
      id - persistant external id of document.
      Throws:
      IOException - Lucene errors.

    • Doc

      public Doc(Alix alix, String id, HashSet<String> fieldsToLoad) throws IOException
      Get a document by String id (persists as long as the source XML doc is not modified), with the set of fields provided (or all fields if fieldsToLoad is null).
      Parameters:
      alix - wrapper on a lucene index.
      id - persistant external id of document.
      fieldsToLoad - list of stored fields to load.
      Throws:
      IOException - Lucene errors.

    • Doc

      public Doc(Alix alix, int docId) throws IOException
      Get a document by lucene docId (persists as long as the Lucene index is not modified) with all fields loaded (even the big ones).
      Parameters:
      alix - wrapper on a lucene index.
      docId - internal lucene docId.
      Throws:
      IOException - Lucene errors.

      docId - internal lucene docId.

  • Method Details

    • contrast

      public String contrast(String field, int docId2) throws IOException, NoSuchFieldException
      With this docId and another docId, with a field name, get stored text, get offsets for indexed term, hilite specific terms of this doc, absent of the other.
      Parameters:
      field - field name with a stored text and terms indexed with offsets.
      docId2 - id of another docuent to compare with.
      Returns:
      stored text hilited.
      Throws:
      IOException - Lucene errors.
      NoSuchFieldException - Field doesn’t exists.

    • contrast

      public String contrast(String field, int docId2, boolean right) throws IOException, NoSuchFieldException
      With this docId and another docId, with a field name, get stored text, get offsets for indexed term, hilite specific terms of this doc, absent of the other.
      Parameters:
      field - field name with a stored text and terms indexed with offsets.
      docId2 - id of another docuent to compare with.
      right - if contrasted doc is displayed on a right side.
      Returns:
      stored text hilited.
      Throws:
      IOException - Lucene errors.
      NoSuchFieldException - Field doesn’t exists.

    • forms

      public static FormEnum forms(Alix alix, int docId, String field, Scorer scorer, Tag.TagFilter wordFilter) throws NoSuchFieldException, IOException
      Count of occurrences by term for the document. Returns an iterator sorted according to a scorer. If scorer is null, default is count of occurrences. FieldText.formEnum(org.apache.lucene.util.BitSet, TagFilter, OptionDistrib)
      Parameters:
      alix - wrapper around an IndexReader with cached stats.
      docId - a document id in t
      field - text field name for a FieldText.
      scorer - score for the terms.
      wordFilter - filter words by tags.
      Returns:
      forms for this document.
      Throws:
      NoSuchFieldException - not a text field.
      IOException - Lucene errors.

    • freq

      public int freq(String field, String[] forms) throws NoSuchFieldException, IOException
      Count occurences of terms in a doc.
      Parameters:
      field - name of a field with indexed term.
      forms - Array of forms.
      Returns:
      Occurrences count for founded forms.
      Throws:
      NoSuchFieldException - not a text field.
      IOException - Lucene errors.

    • freq

      Count occurences of terms in a doc.
      Parameters:
      reader - A Lucene reader to get stats from.
      docId - Lucene internal id of a doc StoredFields.document(int).
      field - name of a field with indexed term.
      forms - Array of forms.
      Returns:
      Occurrences count for founded forms.
      Throws:
      NoSuchFieldException - not a text field.
